attributes.action: All Covid Laws and Restrictions to be removed.
attributes.additional_details:
We want our Freedom back!

We want all temporary Covid laws to be revoked immediately so that our police can start to work again for our freedoms rather than against them.

If the Government doesn't agree...... then we demand an immediate snap election so that this Government can be removed by vote.
attributes.background: The government is to immediately release its public from these Covid restrictions on our freedoms as human beings.  Government is in place to serve and advise not dictate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Repeal the Coronavirus Act 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313310
